explains: n. 狂热；激怒；喧闹；感动

sentences.cn: 那么，如何解释这份狂热呢？

sentences.en: The furor died down, and I realized that none of it had any relevance to what I was doing.
sentences.cn: 对这本书的狂热逐渐平静下去了，我意识到这和我的写作没有任何关系。

sentences.en: Do you know where he went?” But we do not want to create what you would think of as a public furor.
